Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. With its innovative features and high-quality materials, this product is truly a game-changer in its field. Given its exceptional value and versatility, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or operations. I am offering you the opportunity to secure this product at an exclusive price of $15000. This offer is not only a testament to the product's worth but also includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure your satisfaction. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
